sentence.Network_en: I can whip round to your place after work and collect the papers that I need for tomorrow.
sentence.Network_cn: 我可以下班后去你住处取我明天所需要的文件.

sentence.Network_en: We're having a whip - round for old Fred, who's retiring from the firm.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们正在为即将从公司退休的老弗雷德进行募捐.

sentence.Network_en: I'll whip round and raise a few pounds for the office party.
sentence.Network_cn: 我将募捐,筹集几个英镑,以举为这个办公室聚会.

RelatedPhrase.word: whip the devil round the stump

list.key: whip the devil round the stump
list.abs: stump是什么意思... ... up a stump adv. 处境尴尬 whip the devil round the stump v. 取巧,自欺其人 at stump 在山场.

entry.def: When a group of people have a whip-round, money is collected from each person so that it can be used to buy something for all of them or for someone they all know.

means.word_mean: 1. solicitation of money usually for a benevolent purpose

auth_sentence.content: But in the fifth round he just went down.
auth_sentence.res_content: But in the fifth round he just went down.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But in the fifth round he just went down.

auth_sentence.content: His movement, finishing and all-round ability are outstanding.
auth_sentence.res_content: His movement, finishing and all-round ability are outstanding.

auth_sentence.content: Here some rain can occur all the year round.
